name: Gjana's World
description:
bout
Gjana's World is a classic platform game. You must beware from enemies and obstacles and finish the levels.
Meanwhile you can explore the world from the points in the levels.

Story
Ellen is an Explorer Captain in Unity. In this game, we are witnessing one of the quests for a new planet.
Ellen investigates the suitability of the Gjana world for humanity.
She needs an operator to help her in this mission.

Gameplay
Gameplay is an action platformer focused on melee.

Don't hesitate to contact!
